p: (3β,5α,8α,22 E)-Epidioxy-24-norcholesta-6,22-dien-3-ol ( 31) was detected in the sea pen, opisthobranch mollusk Virgularia sp. [ 94], and in A. nigra, D. cylindrus, and T. juniperina [ 85]. (3β,5α,8α,24(28E))-Epidioxy-24-ethylcholesta-6,24(28)-dien-3-ol ( 32) has been isolated and structure elucidated from several tunicates, namely Ascidia nigra and Dendrogyra cylindrus, and (3β,5α,8α,24(28) Z)-form was detected in Dendrodoa grossularia [ 85, 86].
